tuba quartets going through related videos again. came across two tuba quartets

Les Tubadours
my fav video: old legend

there are two other ones. the other Sass Philosophy is more jazzy. the other "some italian name" is repetitive

even found the sheet music for old legend

one of the members of Les Tubadours is also part of another group Cosmopolitan Quartet
website: http://www.cosmopolitanquartet.com/

all songs are pretty modern/difficult for me to understand. there's quite a beautiful one  though
